name: Triaina
ability: Moderately restores HP to Anima team members at the start of each wave.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the trident that Poseidon is said to have wielded. In her glory days she was like an extension of Poseidon's own arm. Now, since becoming a spirit, she's secretly taken up cooking as a hobby. She just loves entertaining guests with a meal of freshly caught fish. This has led her to spend a lot of time with other food-loving spirits and thus form many close friendships.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 14/06/17- 05/07/2017
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 02/07/2017 - 05/07/2017
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the Skill DMG of all allies by 33% during the "Coastal Calamity - Tanabata Beach Contest" event.
◦ The effect increases with the number of limit breaks. (33% → 49.75% → 66.5% → 83.25% → 100%)
◦ Summon rate increased until 14/06/17- 05/07/2017

main: "Meet me in the ocean if you're in the mood for a tasty treat!"
skill: "This might hurt just a teensy little bit!"
